channel.title: Hi, I'm Sean McKenna
channel.description:
Hello, my name is Sean McKenna and I'm a career software developer just getting started building my own business. I'm still figuring out what exactly my niche will be, and still working my day job in the meantime.
I've been looking for an online community for bootstrappers, and when I saw @patio11 mention this site, I hopped right over. Looks like there is lots of great discussions already. Also glad to be introduced to this podcast, as soon as I get a chance I'll start listening from the beginning.
Looking forward to meeting everyone! Sean

item.title: Hi, I'm Sean McKenna
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
